main event: On October 25, 1966, a bright object was observed in the sky moving eastward in Centerville, Ohio for 30 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared to zigzag and was reported by civilian witnesses,The object was compared to the star Capella, but the witnesses were puzzled by its movement and disappearance behind trees,One witness had previously seen a similar object on August 2, 1966, in the same area,The object was described as having colors of orange, red, and white, and was said to emit no sound,The sighting was analyzed and concluded to likely be an astronomical observation.
sighted object: a bright object in the sky
witness description: A female aged 46, who experienced the sighting while riding her bike.
